MOAR3.SA.summary: Monteiro Aranha S.A., through its subsidiaries, operates in the pulp and paper, petrochemical, and real estate sectors in Brazil. It is involved in the manufacture, export, and recycling of paper; and production and sale of wood in logs, as well as offers packaging papers, corrugated packaging, and industrial bags. The company also distributes fuel and LPG; produces ethylene oxide and its derivatives, specialty chemicals, fatty alcohols, and co-products; and operates liquid bulk storage carriers. In addition, it operates drugstores; and invests in and develops residential and commercial real estate projects. Monteiro Aranha S.A. is based in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

RPAD3.SA.summary: Alfa Holdings S.A. provides private banking services in Brazil. It offers corporate and individual credit, treasury, third party asset management, wealth management, and mergers and acquisitions services. The company was formerly known as Real S.A. and changed its name to Alfa Holdings S.A. in April 1999. Alfa Holdings S.A. was incorporated in 1959 and is headquartered in SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil.

SIMH3.SA.summary: SIMPAR S.A., through its subsidiaries, provides road logistics services in Brazil. Its services include road cargo transport services, dedicated road cargo logistics, commodity logistics, warehousing services, urban distribution, internal logistics, and chartering. The company is also involved in the rental and sale of trucks, machinery, and equipment; and provision of leasing, freight payment, and financial services, as well as light vehicle rental and fleet management services. In addition, it offers fleet management and outsourcing services; and operates a total of 14 car dealership stores selling Volkswagen, FIAT, and Ford brands located in the state of SÃ£o Paulo. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil.
